recommended_degree: Teknik Mesin, Teknik Industri, Teknik Pangan (Sarjana)
job_description: The intern will support the development and documentation of procedures related to Autonomous Maintenance (AM) and Progressive Maintenance (PM). This includes collecting data from operations, standardizing maintenance steps, drafting clear work instructions, and coordinating with the Engineering and Production teams to ensure the procedures reflect actual shop-floor practices. The intern will also help review existing documents, update maintenance standards, and support the implementation of AM/PM activities. This position is onsite at the Gunung Putri plant.
